thread.title: Activist fund Elliott takes $1 billion stake in Hyundai

title: Activist fund Elliott takes $1 billion stake in Hyundai
text:
Activist fund Elliott takes $1 billion stake in Hyundai Wednesday, April 04, 2018 - 01:49 
A unit of U.S. activist hedge fund Elliott Management reveals that it holds more than $1 billion worth of shares in key affiliates of South Korea’s Hyundai Motor Group and calls for more rapid reform of the auto giant’s governance.   
A unit of U.S. activist hedge fund Elliott Management reveals that it holds more than $1 billion worth of shares in key affiliates of South Korea’s Hyundai Motor Group and calls for more rapid reform of the auto giant’s governance.  //reut.rs/2q4iCSu
